note:
Deep in the heart of the woods, there once lived a tree that spent its years gathering stories from every creature of the forest. Over time it learned to craft a human body for itself, so that it may travel to distant lands to find tales it had never known. Some say it still lives in a secret grove, waiting to be discovered, and eager to share its collection with all who come to visit.

Its me. I'm the tree. Nice to meet you :)

note:
Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
